thought: The website is accessible. Now I should extract the text from the webpage to check for any scam characteristics.
observation: Capstone Realty | Developers of Real Estate in Louisville, KY  call 502.254.5001 Home About Properties River Ridge Five Projects Tenants Contact Welcome to Capstone Realty Your Trusted Resource in Real Estate DEVELOPMENT & MANAGEMENT 1 2 3 Previous Next Capstone Realty is a full-service real estate company providing professional and attentive leasing, management, design and development services to our clients in Louisville Metro. We are a partnership of experienced real estate professionals active in acquisition, land development, project architecture, leasing, and property management. As part of our real estate portfolio, our premier developments include Commerce Crossings, 350+ acre business park with space available for a variety of business applications in Louisville, Kentucky and River Ridge Commerce Center in Indiana, where our developments are part of a 6,000-acre multi-use mega site experiencing unprecedented growth, just 10 minutes from downtown Louisville. Learn More About Us Commerce 2.6 million SF of Class A industrial real estate River 2.3 million SF of Class A logistics space Properties Available for Lease At Capstone Realty, we are a dedicated team of professionals providing exceptional commercial real estate leasing, coupled with unbeatable asset and property management services. Learn more about our available commercial properties in Commerce Crossings and River Ridge Commerce Center. At Capstone Realty we are always striving to add value by offering exceptional leasing, highest quality property management and tenant relation services. Located in River Ridge Commerce
